scripts.mainnet:deploy-contracts: cross-env TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 npx hardhat run src/promptDeploy.ts --network mainnet --no-compile
scripts.mainnet:deploy-airdrop: cross-env TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 npx hardhat run src/airdrop/promptDeployAirdrop.ts --network mainnet --no-compile
scripts.mainnet:mint-voting-tokens: cross-env TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 npx hardhat run src/votingToken/promptMintFromListOfVotingTokens.ts --network mainnet --no-compile
scripts.mainnet:deposit-voting-tokens: cross-env TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 npx hardhat run src/vaults/lockingVault/promptChooseLockingVaultAndDepositTokens.ts --network mainnet --no-compile
scripts.goerli:deploy-contracts: cross-env TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 npx hardhat run src/promptDeploy.ts --network goerli --no-compile
scripts.goerli:deploy-airdrop: cross-env TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 npx hardhat run src/airdrop/promptDeployAirdrop.ts --network goerli --no-compile
scripts.goerli:propose-remove-vesting-vault: cross-env TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 npx hardhat run src/coreVoting/proposals/createProposalRemoveVestingVault.ts --network goerli --no-compile
scripts.goerli:propose-one-second-timelock-wait-: cross-env TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 npx hardhat run src/coreVoting/proposals/createProposalSetWaitTime.ts --network goerli --no-compile
scripts.goerli:mint-voting-tokens: cross-env TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 npx hardhat run src/votingToken/promptMintFromListOfVotingTokens.ts --network goerli --no-compile
scripts.goerli:deposit-voting-tokens: cross-env TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 npx hardhat run src/vaults/lockingVault/promptChooseLockingVaultAndDepositTokens.ts --network goerli --no-compile
scripts.local:deploy-contracts: cross-env TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 npx hardhat run src/promptDeploy.ts --network localhost --no-compile
scripts.local:deploy-airdrop: cross-env TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 npx hardhat run src/airdrop/promptDeployAirdrop.ts --network localhost --no-compile
scripts.local:mint-voting-tokens: cross-env TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 npx hardhat run src/votingToken/promptMintFromListOfVotingTokens.ts --network localhost --no-compile
scripts.local:deposit-voting-tokens: cross-env TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 npx hardhat run src/vaults/lockingVault/promptChooseLockingVaultAndDepositTokens.ts --network localhost --no-compile
